Name: public
Description: The public modifier allows access from any other code.

Name: private
Description: The private modifier restricts access to the containing type or member.

Name: protected
Description: The protected modifier allows access only within the containing type or derived types.

Name: internal
Description: The internal modifier allows access within the same assembly.

Name: static
Description: The static modifier indicates that a member belongs to the type itself, rather than to a specific instance.
